kuda daruwanta apachara karana gaman, upath palana kopu pawichchiyata wiruddha ha wena ratawal wala dahas ganan marana yuddha walata paksha wena gaman, ammage jiwithe anathure unath, gabsawakin kalalaya iwath karanawata wiruddha ayath me ratawal wala innawa.

pasugiya dineka sirikotha idiripita pawathi dewana bodubala sena udghoshanaye di daya gamage saha rawi karunanayaka mahathwarun bhikshungen samawa illa siti wita podu wipakshaye wamawadi udghoshakayan kalabala wiya.
namuth kawada ho ewani thanakata aawoth pamanayi mama balaporoththu wana sewaya rate janathawata, ratata mata karanna hakiwenne.
rojar kesmant upatha labanne 1864 di ayarlanthaye prothesthantha kristhiyani pawulaka.
aththatama ehema wiwaha wela passe galapenne na kiyala dikkasada wenawata wadiya ekata jiwath wela nogalapena bawa therum aragana wenwena eka hondayi.”
ema thataka itha digin saha palalin yuktha wiya.
mema siduwima wu bawa kiyana nowambar 25 wanida ema kanyaramaye demapiya raswimak sandaha pamina aththe demapiyan ata denaku bawath, wimarshakayan soyagena atha.
yako api mokatada suddange
ksima welawaka ihala yanna pahadili margayak nathi thanaka pal wenna epa.
parlimenthu mathiwaranayak waha kadawanna.
ee anuwa dewana ramses hewath firawnwa muhudehi gilwa maranayata pathkala yanna alkuraanaya pawasima sathyayaki.
api liyanne apita kamathi denan anik ayath awulak nathiwa balanawa nan ane katawath mokea් meya....
me kawiya nam athi sundarayi..
anthimata owun wihiluwata men ee kathawe koheta ho mawath gawa gani.
'sinhala saha demala jathika bhasha wanneya' kiyana ekada?
ethanata giyahama ethana thawa keliyayi!
dimankata me dawaswala prasanga nam aduyilu.
udgathawa pawathi awasthawehi parimanayen mana balanne nam, pawadim pilibanda ithihasayehi mitath wada dushta wu pawadimak soya ganuma apahasu wanu atha.
‘aba’ thiragatha wi wasarak pamana gatha wunata pasuwayi oya thawath chithrapatayakata sambandha wenne?
ohuge hamudawata diwa rathri dekehima satan kirimata hakiyawa thibima wisheshathwayaki.
ethuman wibhaga madhyasthanaye shaladhipathiwarayata pudgalika wa katha kala.
ewani witekadi ‘tawume iskole’ yam pamanaka ho ath waradimak kiya da ohuta sithenu atha.
walata issalla karaganna
diyawadiyawa yanu thawaduratath wirala rogayak nowe eya ithamath sulaba rogayaki emanisa niyamitha lesa pariksha karawa ganimen rogaya kalin hadunaganima menma sankulatha walakwa ganimatada hethu we.
bohoma sansun iriyawwen sakachchawa awasan kara yannata sudanamwu jef ganar prakasha kalaha.
prawargaya:shri lankiya sangithagnyayan
gamata palamak nowuna nisa siduwuna anathuru nam kochchara da kiyanna baha.”

madhyawedi shriniwasan jain mahatha samaga agramathya ranil wikramasinha mahatha karana lada sakachchawak indiya en.di.ti.wi rupawahiniya pasugiya da wikashaya karana lada athara, dan ema sakachchawa en.di.ti.wi nila web adawiye pala wi atha.
- mama wachanayak kiwa nam, eeka sudusu thana, sudusu widiyata, sithiwili wachanayen nirupanaya karanawa.

thama lingika anekawa yatapathkirima anumatha karana saha ese karana pithru mulika bala niyojithayan ge eelaga ilakkaya wanne, wargika, aagamika, kula ho wenath samaja godanagimaka wana thama anekawa pidanayata path kirima saha balayata yatapath kirimaya.
eeth walakwune nathuwa sema mekata anumathiya gannath awith thibune wishramika niyojya polispathiwarayek.
eyin midiya nowunahoth deshiya samajaya aarthikayak apa wetha nirmanaya wima janathawage sihinayak pamanak wanu atha.
indiyawa me weddi gihin thiyena dura apita yanna bahane.
mathara, pela poth
owun yojana kala.
eksath jathika pakshaye nayaka ranil wikramasinha mahatha agramathyawaraya lesath sajith......
– thamilnaduwe em. si. em. ke. pakshaye nayaka wayiko
